title: Ege University Promotional Web Site
description: A promotional website for Ege University, showcasing its history, departments, and campus life with a modern design and responsive layout.

title: Store App
description: A full-stack e-commerce application featuring product management, user authentication, and a shopping cart system, built with PHP, SQL, and JavaScript.

title: Weather App
description: A weather application that provides real-time weather updates and forecasts using a third-party API, built with React and Tailwind CSS.
